title: And the Land Lay Still
author: Robertson, James
snippet: Fallin; the land of  TB, of  rickets and kinkhoast, measles and buff ets, the cartoon land of  Desperate Dan and Black Bob, Korky the Cat and Keyhole Kate, Lord Snooty and Pansy Potter, Wuzzy Wiz, Plum McDuff   and Biff o the Bear, the Broons and Oor Wullie, Ba-Bru and Sandy.
